DOC.criteria: All Groups : Must fever ≥100.4° F day vaccination Any underlying chronic illness must stable condition History varicella residence VZVendemic area ≥30 year Group 1 : 70 year age old Took part Shingles Prevention Study ( SPS ) ( V211004 , NCT00007501 ) receive single dose Zoster Vaccine , Live ≥10 year prior enrollment study Group 2 : 70 year age old Group 3 : 60 69 year age Group 4 : 50 59 year age All Groups : History hypersensitivity reaction vaccine component anaphylactic/anaphylactoid reaction neomycin Prior history herpes zoster Pregnant breastfeeding , expect conceive within duration study Has treat immunoglobulin blood product , autologous ( selfdonated ) blood transfusion , 5 month prior vaccination Received vaccine within 4 week prevaccination On immunosuppressive therapy Has know suspect immune dysfunction Is take nontopical antiviral therapy activity herpesviruses , include , limited acyclovir , famciclovir , valacyclovir , ganciclovir . Groups 2 , 3 , 4 : Has previously receive varicella zoster vaccine
